segments.text: I can’t believe how much water is pouring out of that sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is completely flooded, and she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the drain is clogged or if she just forgot to turn it off.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just cascading down the cabinets, making everything slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone is going to slip and fall if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are distracted by the cookies, but this is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around and sees the mess before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a simple problem to fix, but she’s completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t stand seeing this chaos unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
